title: Smile for auntie
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: A gently wicked satiric animated look at an aunt’s attempt to make baby smile. About the strange behaviour adults indulge in when attempting to communicate with, and relate to an infant. The aunt is seen from a child’s eye view. From the book written and illustrated by Diane Paterson. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
